name: Cooperoids
description:
You've drifted into an asteroid field! Fight your way out.

Cooperoids: Tournament Edition

A single-player remake of the Cooperoids Classic. Improves on several aspects of the original.

Cooperoids Classic

The original game: a 4-person local multiplayer game submitted to Mini-Ludum Dare 74.

Credits

Created by toastio, with music by jimeowan.
